cause.description:
Global Impact is a not-for-profit organization dedicated to helping the poorest people on Earth. Representing more than 50 of the most respected U.S.-based international charities, Global Impact touches more than 400 million lives worldwide through disaster relief, education, health training and economic programs that promote self-sufficiency.
1. We provide food, shelter and clean water to disaster victims.
2. We provide health care so people do not die from preventable diseases.
3. We feed starving families and teach them skills to support themselves.
4. We finance small loans so men and women may start businesses to provide for their families.
5. We build schools and train teachers to break the cycle of illiteracy and poverty.
6. We take on real needs by assuring real results.
cause.mission: Assure help for people in need across the globe
cause.name: Global Impact
